t9yTmrXYzngXccRYY.name: Combat Reflexes
t9yTmrXYzngXccRYY.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

tK1MAfVsjZzXXBTe2.name: Fit, Very
tK1MAfVsjZzXXBTe2.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

tUeFWhsD27RVeXwMQ.name: High Pain Threshold
tUeFWhsD27RVeXwMQ.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

tV6CS119Vx4fiZqYn.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
tV6CS119Vx4fiZqYn.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

mguGAA_YUgk63iTeq.name: Easy to Hit
mguGAA_YUgk63iTeq.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

t-4V48E5H5B3tIbMH.name: Signature Gear
t-4V48E5H5B3tIbMH.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

tdalz0XCToGKUvClj.name: Fit
tdalz0XCToGKUvClj.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

t8AKVvEIiAQjeGb8-.name: Luck
t8AKVvEIiAQjeGb8-.notes: Usable once per hour of play

TfbEm1uIOZPo2tglr.name: Choose a total of -50 points in disadvantages that suit character image and background.
TfbEm1uIOZPo2tglr.notes: Here are a few categories to inspire you. Do not take the same trait twice and do not take opposing traits.

TTJQ_fOFyaHPrDuf9.name: Antisocial
TTJQ_fOFyaHPrDuf9.notes: Go light on these problems if you intend to specialize in social skills.

tes-Mzi36rk1AGhj3.name: Intolerance (@Class, Ethnicity, Nationality, Religion, Sex, or Species@)

T0mQz0Hs32K_15vog.name: Clumsy
T0mQz0Hs32K_15vog.notes: Go light on these problems if you plan to focus on physical skills – particularly combat skills.

tVr4lnJhVMvIVebf5.name: Delusion (@anything that overplays your expertise or “natural element"@)

tzQxFJvA8S8UdjYDn.name: Delusion (Guns are no match for fists!)

thB84DNfj4-C-Zf54.name: Delusion (Reality works just like the internet)

tE2VdL4pMY_RquNvE.name: Obsession
tE2VdL4pMY_RquNvE.notes: @Beat a specific rival or win a specific tournament@

TKOCVg67FtvvQ3Rqy.name: Dimwitted
TKOCVg67FtvvQ3Rqy.notes: Go light on these problems if you hope to play an intellectual with many technical skills

tX2lWf6FhOykayJ8T.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

t1P159l6qkwOHYsw6.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
t1P159l6qkwOHYsw6.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

tutbCoWXpAvP5IF7x.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
tutbCoWXpAvP5IF7x.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

tR2ZHT2MvO6n1A4wS.name: Obsession
tR2ZHT2MvO6n1A4wS.notes: @with a specifc computer hack, invention, research project, etc.@

tk1FWcVD0Lwn2EAI-.name: Trademark (@any design, methodology, or means of executing a technical task that’s uniquely yours@)

tacpMfc6V88x593-7.name: Trademark (@any design, methodology, or means of executing a technical task that’s uniquely yours@)

toT-iYK-V7hRMQA58.name: Obsession
toT-iYK-V7hRMQA58.notes: @with bringing a criminal to justice, exacting revenge, solving a particular case, etc.@

tgWpgU932Rr-LOJ7p.name: Compulsive Behavior
tgWpgU932Rr-LOJ7p.notes: @a skilled activity such as hacking computers, modifying cars, or working out@

trNPZatnmN8li7qbi.name: Insomniac (Mild)
trNPZatnmN8li7qbi.notes: GM secretly rolls 3d for the number of days between episodes

tgAvz7VLqgabQbZnR.name: Insomniac (Severe)
tgAvz7VLqgabQbZnR.notes: GM secretly rolls 2d-1 for the number of days between episodes

TU4Hg0OhyrIvwBwls.name: Out of Shape
TU4Hg0OhyrIvwBwls.notes: Go light on these problems if you plan to focus on physical skills – particularly combat skills.

tbklHD2NNSQ-WehLF.name: Chummy
tbklHD2NNSQ-WehLF.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

t5CsZAkjTVNPolGJH.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
t5CsZAkjTVNPolGJH.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

tdLKhSlAY1d5WV9bC.name: Insomniac (Mild)
tdLKhSlAY1d5WV9bC.notes: GM secretly rolls 3d for the number of days between episodes

tzmYu31CjTP7_Prlq.name: Insomniac (Severe)
tzmYu31CjTP7_Prlq.notes: GM secretly rolls 2d-1 for the number of days between episodes

TNW4rqkWTNXzEyNMp.name: Socially Awkward
TNW4rqkWTNXzEyNMp.notes: Go light on these problems if you intend to specialize in social skills.
